entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
